website_summaries.verdict: This attractive option is compact but still capable of producing a large amount of smoke at a time.
pros: Rugged metal body that is both compact and attractive
Can be used with or without the extender tubing to add smoky accents to foods, beverages
Simple to use, and capable of creating a large volume of smoke
cons: A poorly marked battery compartment can lead to battery overheating
The extender hose is a bit thin/flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Work great. I took the rubber tubing off. Easier for me to use it that way. As a vegan I enjoy adding smokey flavor to my lentil loafs and veggie burgers. Really gives food a nice smoky flavor. I also use it to smoke my bourbon glass before making my old fashions!!
customer_reviews.author: designer label lover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, must have for vegetarians
customer_reviews.text: so quick and easy to use. The possibilities are endless. Day One I smoked soft boiled eggs and avocados with alder wood and a vegetarian turkey roast with hickory. So, so good. Gives vegetarian food a meaty smoky flavor without the meat!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Brokaw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome low cost machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome low cost machine. Ivery used it on steaks for about 10 mins sitting in the smoke and it adds flavor. Also I rigged up a dome for it and usEd it with scallops and shrimp too. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: OMG it actually works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this largely thinking that it was too cheap to work, but cheap enough that I wouldn't be to upset if, in fact, it didn't work. It works, it works, and it does impart a nice smokey taste to meats, fish and I even smoked a black bean soup, and that made the soup a keeper, no one will figure out how I did it. It's very easy to operate, keep clean and put away. You wont spend long hours figuring out how to do it, maybe 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Simple lot of smoke.
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how much smoke flavor you can get from such a small simple device. I am one who appreciates simplicity because it usually leads to longevity. Looks like I won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. High quality and simple to use. Great for adding smoke to ribs and salmon!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Stepanek

customer_reviews.title: Smokin delicious flavor!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love this little smoker! It’s so easy to use and the smoke flavor is mouth watering and delicious. I used it today as soon as I got it on a steak and grilled onions, I was in foodie heaven. I can’t wait to try it out on cheese, nuts and wings. Remember when lighting the wood chips make sure the machine is on. I durn near burnt my finger off trying to light it when it was off. So don’t make my mistake. I have an outdoor smoker for big batches, but for a quick meal , you can’t go wrong with this gem. Can’t wait to try it on burgers tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Snowcat60Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after looking at cool smokers that cost much more. The area that the wood shavings go in is plastic. I would have expected metal, as I would think the plastic would eventually melt, and effect the taste at a minimum, or create health hazard at worst. The tube that provides the smoke is does not fit well, and slides off very easily. It also has a very strong rubber smell... The housing that is removable for cleaning does not fit well and no longer fits flush with the smoker. The only reason I have given it two stars, is that it does provide a great amount of smoke. Bottom line, would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Dean E Scott

customer_reviews.title: I really only purchased this because I love a smoked Old Fashioned and the big name brand ...
customer_reviews.text: I really only purchased this because I love a smoked Old Fashioned and the big name brand was too expensive to warrant a purchase just for one use (I'm a big believer in not owning uni-taskers—thanks, Alton Brown). This is easy to use and portable, so I can take it out on the patio with me to make a round of drinks for friends. Plus, you can use it to smoke meats. It infuses the smoke flavor in seconds, which I actually thought was probably asking too much of a tiny portable smoker. This definitely works as well as claimed and I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I had order diffent brands of this same model before probably 15 times within 2 years for work and it always dies within 2 months of use, thought this particular brand would be a difference but it wasn't , there is a black grime buildup that we try to clean constntly but it will always eventually die,
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Great while it works. Replaced twice already.
customer_reviews.text: I love using this smoke infuser. It's really easy to use and you can really tell the difference between something "smoked" and non-smoked. That being said, just like the Gourmia sv130 (sous vide cooker), I think there are some quality control issues. I use this as instructed. Only letting it run for a few seconds. Even while making sure to follow the instructions, my original unit and its replacement both stopped working. I'm on my third unit. We'll see if this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Minoba82

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a gift to a Pro/Am smoker. He loves it. I bought my personal one 6 months ago and use it often for single dishes.This concentrates a boat load of smoke for a small efficient product. A little smoke goes a long way to enhance your food. This is the only unit I found to do that.
customer_reviews.author: cemptor

customer_reviews.title: Good costumer care
customer_reviews.text: works really fine, i had some problems but they send me a new one! Really good!
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: When the real outdoors is cold and snowy...
customer_reviews.text: I can still smoke pork loins! Now smoked meat is not just for summer, awesome
customer_reviews.author: Wyogunner

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level cold smoker to try it out.
customer_reviews.text: Produces a LOT of smoke in a short period of time. Only thing keeping it from five stars is the noise and vibration. Almost seems like the fan might be out of balance.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This little smoker is a lot of fun. I always wanted one but didn't want to pay $100. The only downside is it heats up after a few min and has to cool down.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I do NOT recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: After using 3 times, the unit melted its plastic internals destroying itself and the food I was smoking. Big disapontment. I do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mcamazoner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: definitely use it in a well ventilated area. Still experimenting with it
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and produces lots of smoke. I infuse my Old Fasioned drinks and tried it with fish.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: and this was a great deal. I have used it several times
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for quite some time, and this was a great deal. I have used it several times, and the results are excellent. I have used it to smoke Bourbon for cocktails, and it was delicious! I also used it to tea smoke some shrimp, and the extra flavor dimension really highlighted the final dish. This tool makes smoking on a small scale very easy, it imparts a nice flavor, and is a quick way to take food up a notch. Of course this wont take the place of a full size smoker, you can't smoke a brisket, but it does the job beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: device seems like the attachments are a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: the first time ordered, there were shipping issues. second time it was on time as advertised. still finding out how much smoke to use, device seems like the attachments are a little flimsy. will update as it gets used more.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, until it no longer worked.
customer_reviews.text: I loved making some smoked old fashions...and also impressing my guests. It suddenly stopped working. When I replaced the batteries the item still didn't work. Unfortunately it's now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are very hard to understand can't figure out how to use this item very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Smoke em up
customer_reviews.text: I have only just started using this and I am thoroughly impressed. Nicely designed and produces plenty of smoke. Probably should not use it too close to your smoke alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Great portability
customer_reviews.text: Nice little machine. Creates wonderful smoke. Very portable. Easy to use. Holds just the right amount of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Dumas-Otis

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great for smoked cocktails
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great for smoked cocktails! It leaks a fair amount of smoke and is a bit cumbersome because of the rigid rubber hose... but the price is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: David Esler

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It does what it suppose to do for the fraction of the cost....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Smoker failed after first try. Refund requested from amazon. Returning to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Rand

customer_reviews.title: imparts a good but superficial flavor
customer_reviews.text: works well, imparts a good but superficial flavor. I've used it so far for sous vide meats and for alcoholic drinks. Fantastic for smoky margaritas. For the price its definitely a neat little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: mikio mcculloch

customer_reviews.title: How did I not have this before?
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is everything I wanted and so easy to use - at a great price. I've smoked everything from onions, mushrooms to bourbon. Buying more for holiday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had it for a week and it stops working
customer_reviews.author: NOla 12

customer_reviews.title: SO SO EASY
customer_reviews.text: I ENJOY HOW SMALL AND PORTABLE IS. WITH SOUS VIDE COOKING SHOOT AS MUCH SMOKE IN BAGS PROVIDES A MILD SMOKE FLAVOR. YOU CAN SMOKE CHEESE WHAT EVER KIND YOU HAVE IN 20 MIN. GIVE IT A TRY IT'S EASY
customer_reviews.author: John Tessman

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple , easy to use , and definitely a super easy way to infuse foods with a whole other dimension of flavor. It has already changed my culinary game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, smoked cocktails
customer_reviews.text: Simple, value conscious choice for making smoked cocktails. Fan is abundantly strong to pull smoke from woodchips and fill a container or two. It delivers what is says.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Simple for home usage
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, easy producing a lot of smoke from small amount of chips
customer_reviews.author: Leonid R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Just received our gourmia smoker. It works wonderfully. So far my husband has smoked only beverages but has many plans for it.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product, works well and seems quality built especially for the price compared to the other smoking guns
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: with good results.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have smoked salsa and almonds, with good results.
customer_reviews.author: Percy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. Absolutely no problems with the battery compartment as others have said. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until I had to change the batteries and it never worked again.
customer_reviews.author: Ajx

customer_reviews.title: High quality smoker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing smoker, worked exactly as advertised and produces more than enough smoke. High quality materials, I can see it last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It stopped once for me.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working for me And i forced the fan around with a small knife and it started working again. With that said I am afraid it will stop again and not re-start . I have used it once after the incident and it did keep working. It does do a good job at smoking food. I just hope it does continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Broken, waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product about 5 times so far. It just stopped working today. It turns on, but there is no smoke being pumped out of the unit. Unit was not abused or used for prolonged periods of time. Don't bother buying this, it will just break.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine V.

customer_reviews.title: Not working 4 me !!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about this product I'm having a very hard time to get it 2light ,if I could learn the secret to getting it lit I will revise my review
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after few uses
customer_reviews.text: I like smoking results. The point is after 6 months and after just a few uses, the fan stopped working. I contacted de manufacturer and, as I live outside USA there was no recommendation on how to fix it. In addition, as I had received a refund by Amazon due to delivery issues when I purchased, the manufacurer didn't offer any alternative to have the equipment replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Melo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice. I can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good smoker, but it has an odd smell initially ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good smoker, but it has an odd smell initially first out of the package. Tried washing it a few times, but it's still there. It affected it a little bit but not too much
customer_reviews.author: christopher cho

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working in less than one month! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fine for light home use, not great though
customer_reviews.text: It lacks a decent motor and won't push smoke through liquids at all. As well the box around the motor and bowl for wood chips leaks smoke, though not very much. Works great for small projects though, was even able to fill up a full-sized hotel pan with heavy wood-smoke fairly easily. As a culinary professional though I think it's not a good option for anything more than light use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum! That’s all I can say...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a junkie for barbecue, but I can’t be bothered with the mess of a smoker. I bought this to test out on some steaks and ribs for a football tailgate. I was totally floored. Everyone kept commenting on the intense, smoky flavor of the meat. And I had literally grilled it up in a matter of minutes! Instead of using wood chips I eventually branched out to using herbs and spices for other dishes. Definitely a unique piece to have, especially since it’s portable for camping, tailgating, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Handheld Smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for a simple, handheld smoker. Excellent for smoking cocktails, chips, etc - just be sure to run it several times before using it for smoking food or drinks, the first 5 or 6 rounds of smoking with it gives a slightly odd taste from manufacturing (it goes away after about 1/2 dozen uses though, so just break it in correctly and You're god to go).
customer_reviews.author: BrewCityMusic

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF BATTERY INSTALLATION
customer_reviews.text: Great little item at a fairly good price, excellent customer service and a dreadfully inferior instruction manual. Please be careful with battery installation - follow good judgment and not illustration or instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Judge Jodi Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Glad it wasn't expensive
customer_reviews.text: This smoke blower/gun works as expected and is easy to use. Gourmia makes some pretty impressive products at affordable price points. I've tried this and a more expensive, similar product and the bottom line for me is that neither produces the smokiness that I desire. There is a faint smokiness, but sometimes it can be missed on stronger flavored foods. Overall, I'm not that impressed at this point with smoke guns in general. What is nice is that this product didn't cost the 4x of price other fancier guns producing similar results. Overall, I'd rate it as a novelty. It works, but I think these things are over-hyped.
customer_reviews.author: J. StumpfelTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I finally tested this smoker today before using it to smoke a dish for Christmas dinner tomorrow. It works perfectly!! And the price is considerably less than the product I was considering but reluctant to spend the money on. Make sure you use it in a ventilated space without smoke alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for ... just barely
customer_reviews.text: At a price of $30.00 I was not expecting a "Great Performer" and this machine met my limited expectations. My unit arrived with a non-functioning power switch, but it is just not worth the hassle to exchange it. I am just removing the batteries when not in use to shut it off, as it is always on when installed.I have already used it to Smoke some Potato salad, Salmon,Cheese and Chicken and it provides a decent amount of smoke for its size. Would I buy it again? Probably not ... I would opt for spending a little more for a lot better unit. Bottom Line ... It's cheap and despite the defective switch basically does the task.
customer_reviews.author: Attila Von Stryker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: We love it so much we bought another to give as a Christmas gift. Used it the same day it arrived and only smoked ground meat for venison chili for 4 minutes and it was amazing how well the smoke flavor came through into the entire dish. It kicked the flavor up immensely and took the chili over the top.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rhew

customer_reviews.title: If you like smoking foods, you will love this "smoke gun"!
customer_reviews.text: I smoke fish, chicken, pork chops, steaks, and anything else I can find an excuse to smoke with my Gourmia Infusion Smoker (I call it a smoke gun). It is a lot easier and more convenient to use than any other food smoker device that I know of!
customer_reviews.author: B. Entrekin

customer_reviews.title: Smoke infuser
customer_reviews.text: I use this to add just a little smoke flavoring to my food, you will need a cover to trap in the smoke, but it definitely works as described. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised. Creates quite a bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Creates quite a bit of smoke in a very brief usage. Using this for making smoked whiskey drinks, and it has turned out to be a much more affordable solution opposed to the enclosed glass models. Just put the glass on a plate with a large glass bowl over it and it smokes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Takes very little product to smoke
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Takes very little product to smoke. Easy to clean. It’s small, it’s portable, IT WORKS and the price incredibly reasonable!! We are using it for cocktails and smoking small things. Nothing large yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great with 2-4 pellets for smoking
customer_reviews.text: Works great with 2-4 pellets for smoking. The burn chamber does get hot so avoid getting burned. Hose is durable enough for the heat. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Eng

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. A perfect present
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. A perfect present. Solidly constructed and very powerful motor inside. Gets the job done in half the time!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Simple and No Frills but works
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple design and easy to use. For the price it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Cook

customer_reviews.title: it does what it says but the smoke is extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: it does what it says but the smoke is extremely heavy do you not use this for over 30 seconds
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I did really love this thing until it stopped sucking in the smoke. Motor works but seems gummed up or something.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Pack

customer_reviews.title: Seems cheap but works fine.  I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: The thing starts rattling until the chips I'm smoking warm up the top of the device. It works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. The design should have a latch to keep the top piece attached.
customer_reviews.author: doug stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make Smokey old fashions and its awesome. Haven’t smoked any food yet but will at some point.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Smoke whatever you want
customer_reviews.text: So far this thing is awesome. It gives out a huge amount of smoke for so little wood chips and flavors food so well. I made a smoked chocolate cake with a Nutella mouse frosting, the smoke flavor was just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Burchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and does what it’s supposed to. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jody Adams

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Price is right for as much as you use it. it workswell.
customer_reviews.author: tim mcguinness

customer_reviews.title: I had a whisky old fasion at a local pub ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a whisky old fasion at a local pub and they added there own smoke to the mason jar, What a treat!
customer_reviews.author: jack verburgt

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought one sooner. Great value. Easy to use. Adds much flavor to foods easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made/bad design
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was shocked at the poor materials and construction. The top falls off at the slightest wiggle. And the whole thing looks like it was made in the cheapest possible way. Also, it's a ridiculous design – it's basically just a little tiny battery operated fan with a hose. Nothing more. Very disappointing – this is going right back.
customer_reviews.author: emmsf

customer_reviews.title: Great smoke gun
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It works great for the demands of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Chef

customer_reviews.title: Great, when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Great, when it worked. I only used this item once. It definitely helped add flavor to the steak I was making. The second time I used it, it no longer would turn on. I reoriented the batteries, and I noticed my batteries were hot and there was a burnt smell. The contacts were also hot, so something must have fried. I replaced the batteries also to make sure. Poor build quality. Also, I never received the e-cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G

customer_reviews.title: First one broke.  They are sending another
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have had it for 2 weeks and used it about 4 times and now it won't turn on. Also after I've used it a few times it leaves a sticky residue in the fan area you have to clean and smells really strong. I had to store it in the garage. Email customer support about it. Edit : Gourmia is sending me a replacement. The last one may have been a dud (and a few bad reviews close to the date of my purchase could confirm this) Waiting for my new smoker to give it a thorough test.
customer_reviews.author: TERRA SHINKLE

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that smoke comes out where the wood chip box ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday and tried it on a couple of things. I don't like that smoke comes out where the wood chip box and the battery compartment attach. And I didn't get a cookbook like it says.
customer_reviews.author: parlyview

customer_reviews.title: Minimally works.
customer_reviews.text: Neat idea, but fan is so small that it produces almost no force. You can insert the hose into a glass of liquid and zero bubbles come up, meaning it can’t even overcome the slight pressure of the liquid. Forget trying to add smoke to a Bloody Mary, it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Read

customer_reviews.title: This died after 4 brief uses of under a minute each
customer_reviews.text: This died after 4 brief uses of under a minute each, it's like the smoke gummed up the motor and it won't spin anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A LaVelle

customer_reviews.title: Won't take much cabinet space!
customer_reviews.text: This is to be a gift, so I can't say how it works. However, it arrived quickly in good condition, and appears to be nice. It is small, which is good so that it won't take up room in the cupboards. Hopefully my son-in-law won't be disappointed that it's not shaped like a gun, because that saved $50!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: This infuser is kind of like cheating, but in the best way possible
customer_reviews.text: Smoky perfection. This infuser is kind of like cheating, but in the best way possible! I just received it and can't wait to try it out. This seems like a great way to get the genuine smokehouse taste without all of the hassle plus you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: NL

product_meta.title: Gourmia Portable Infusion Smoker Cool Smoke to Enhance Taste Battery Operated Compact & Convenient, Free E-Cookbook Included
product_meta.description: Here is what it is inside: 1) heavy duty metal body 2) fan to vitalize the smoke warning: never leave the machine unattended while using and never use when the metal chamber or the stainless steel mesh filter is not in place as it will cause harm to the machine. here is how we recommend to use it: place the batteries on the opposite side of the nuzzle two downwards two upwards close it, put wood chips inside the metal chamber, lit with a match small lighter or a Torch, make sure the food is sealed, place the nuzzle inside let the smoke go for 2-3 minutes, extinguish the fire turn off the machine let the smoke set and you are ready to go, enjoy your gourmet smoked food.
feature_bullets: HASSLE free - with the Gourmia portable infusion smoker you are minutes away from eating delicious smoked food just grab it, light the wood chips, teas and spices, even hay, dried flowers and herbsto INFUSE a variety of natural smoky flavors to an array of food and drinks

Cool smoke- to ensure the taste of your food doesn't get ruined, our state-of-the-art designed fan filters out the heat from the smoke so the smoke is cool when leaving the nozzle and your food stays as you perfected it.

Battery operated- you should not have to be near an outlet every time you want to get quick fresh smoked food, with the Gourmia portable infusion smoker that’s battery operated just press the button and it’s working.

Easy to storage- if you like good tasty smoked food that doesn't mean you need a large storage room, garage or shed to store it, with this compact size it doesn't matter the size of your apartment, you can keep it everywhere including cabinet, pantry or anywhere where something small Fits.
Explore deliciousness- to experience a sizzling beef rib steak, well done pork shoulder, tasty pastrami or game birds with a twist, just smoke it grab a beer and enjoy food at its finest.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars140 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
